home.title: Compare & Book Cheap Flights in Scandinavia ✈️ | {{domain}}
home.description: Find the best deals on cheap flights across Sweden, Denmark, Norway, and Finland. Book your next trip with confidence using {{domain}}'s comprehensive flight comparison tool

flights.title: Cheap Flights to Sweden, Denmark, Norway & Finland ✈️ | {{domain}}
flights.description: Search and compare cheap flights from top airlines to your favorite Scandinavian destinations. Book low-cost tickets for domestic and international travel with {{domain}}

destinations.title: Discover Cheap Flights to Top Global Destinations ✈️ | {{domain}}
destinations.description: Explore unbeatable flight deals to the most popular cities and hidden gems worldwide. Use {{domain}} to find the cheapest routes and book your next adventure.

continent.title: Cheap Flights Across {{continent}} ✈️ | Book with {{domain}}
continent.description: Uncover the best flight deals to explore {{continent}}. Save on airfare to exciting destinations across the continent with {{domain}}'s advanced search and booking tools

country.title: Book Cheap Flights to {{country}} ✈️ | Explore with {{domain}}
country.description: Fly to {{country}} with the best deals available. {{domain}} brings you affordable flights to cities across {{country}}, so you can explore without breaking the bank

city.title: Cheap Flights to {{city}} from Just $17 ✈️ | Deals on {{domain}}
city.title_1: Find Cheap Flights to {{city}} | Flight Deals from $17 ✈️ {{domain}}
city.description: Searching for affordable flights to {{city}}? Compare prices by date and book the lowest airfare with {{domain}}'s easy-to-use calendar tool
city.description_1: Unlock unbeatable deals on flights to {{city}}. Use our date-sorted comparison to find the best fares for your travel dates

about.title: About Us | Discover the Best Flight Deals with {{domain}}
about.description: Learn more about {{domain}}, your go-to platform for finding and booking cheap flights to destinations worldwide. Save on your next journey with our trusted service

contact.title: Contact Us | Get Support & Assistance at {{domain}}
contact.description: Need help with your booking or have questions? Contact {{domain}}'s support team for expert assistance and answers to all your travel inquiries
